Can I import my Strava runs to Terra?: Strava don't allow runs to be sent from their platform to other platforms like INTVL. The Strava integration we have only allows us to send INTVL runs to Strava.
can i import my strava runs to terra: Strava don't allow runs to be sent from their platform to other platforms like INTVL. The Strava integration we have only allows us to send INTVL runs to Strava.
what's geofence?: The Geofence removes the start and end points if they fall within the geofenced area for when someone else is viewing the run in the community feed. However for the territory game, we don’t remove the geofence as think of the example where you do multiple runs that start at that geofenced area, if you look at the map then there will be an empty circle of space where the geofence is compared to it just showing a larger area of captured territories and therefore revealing where the user has put a geofence.
I can't add my run from garmin to strava: If you complete a run with your Garmin device and it has been synced to INTVL, however you can't add it to Strava, you need to set that up through Strava and integrate directly with Garmin Connect.
